reviews.review_msg: He is such a nice man but unfortunately that doesn't mean he is a good teacher. I found his instructions complicated and I couldn't always figure out the objective for the activity/assignment. Lectures were dull and it was often challenging to make the connection between what he wanted us to get out of the lesson and what he was lecturing about.
great teacher, if you pay attention, and follow his rubrics
He sucked...i hated that class. dont take it. he was a mega jerk who treated his class like 5 year olds
Nice guy, but perhaps the most boring human ever to live. The entire class would be asleep and he would just keep-on talking and talking and talking...zzzz

An extremely knowledgable, organized, and dedicated professor. Makes activities fun and worthwhile participating in. At times, however, he can drag on about the same point and also put forth thoughts that are irrelevant. With that being said, though, I would recommend taking any class he teaches, or take part in the India Field School like I did.
he IS the mad hatter from alice in wonderland! but yea, friendly, easy as hell "i dont believe in marks.." but a bit on the odd side.. mention 'first nations' to get bonus marks!
Had so much trouble staying awake. A lot of pointless activities. Yes, very much a joke. (Also v.difficult to talk to him face to face, you'll know why).

Don is a great proff teaching a great class. Workshop style of his class is extremely refreshing in this old, stale university we call sfu. Great back burner class, but if you put some effort in, you will get a lot out of it. Would recomend to anyone wanting to become a teacher.
Teaches a pretty easy course.  Barely any readings, assignments were easy and he doesn't really lecture that much, which is good.  Go DOn!
His lecture material and activites were very good, but i would have gotten much more out of the class if he hadn't talked as much. at times he seemed to go off on pointless tangents.
Don is a great prof, I love his style of teaching. He is always there to answer questions and he never belittles his students.
He is a great prof.  He taught me a lot of great information.  Was very interesting and useful.  Assignments can be challenging, but if you work hard you will get a good mark.  Recommended to all!
